functionDescription: This function adds a string to a buffer, resizing the buffer if necessary. It handles buffer overflow and memory allocation errors.

inputInterfaces.name: slen
inputInterfaces.meaning: The length of the string to be added to the buffer.

inoutInterfaces.name: buff
inoutInterfaces.meaning: Pointer to the buffer structure where the string will be added.

inoutInterfaces.name: str
inoutInterfaces.meaning: Pointer to the string that needs to be added to the buffer.
